Headline: බුලත්සිංහල අක්කා,මල්ලී දිවි නසාගැනීම සැක සහිතයි-හමු වූ ලිපිය ලිවුවේ ඔවුන්මද

comments.comment: very sad. These two should have gone to a home without living with relatives.
This is a execellent solution for increasing elderly population. This is called geadiatric care in developing countries.
